tool_description: This API accepts a POST request containing an email address, validates the email format using regular expressions, and checks if the email can be delivered to an active recipient by performing a DNS lookup for the email domain's MX records and connecting to the recipient's SMTP server. The API then returns a JSON response indicating whether the email is valid and can be delivered.
name: Email Validation Activ User , API
title: Email Validation Activ User , API

api_list.name: /validate_email
api_list.description: return json response if email is valid and in use
